front.title: IEEE Guide for the Detection and Location of Acoustic Emissions from Partial Discharges in Oil-Immersed Power Transformers and Reactors

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The detection and location of acoustic emissions from partial discharges and other sources in oil immersed power transformers and reactors are covered in this guide. A means of associating the relative magnitude and position of partial discharges and other sources with the acoustic signals obtained by strategically located transducers is provided.
